I200703221927-200703221927

After creating a new dynamic web project in a fresh workspace, I copied several jars into the WEB-INF/lib folder (externally) and then refreshed the workspace.  I then went into the Navigator view and deleted the .jar files.  This showed up in my log:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.wst.validation 4 0 2007-03-22 22:26:11.204
!MESSAGE 
*** ERROR ***: Thu Mar 22 22:26:11 EDT 2007    java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: Array index out of range: 1
        at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.web.validation.UIWarValidator.validateWebInfLibs(UIWarValidator.java:135)
        at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.web.validation.UIWarValidator.validateInJob(UIWarValidator.java:112)
        at org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.operations.ValidatorJob.run(ValidatorJob.java:68)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
Fix committed to HEAD (will release when I-build declared)
Closing as part of mass query to clean up old resolved bugs in untargetted milestones.
